per_frame_1=//zoom = 1.0;
per_frame_2=decay = 1;
per_frame_3=//warp = 0;
per_frame_4=wave_a = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_7=tin = time;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=an = an + tic*bass*bass*.5;
per_frame_10=q1 = sin(an);
per_frame_11=q2 = cos(an);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=an2 = an2 - tic*mid*mid*.4;
per_frame_14=q3 = sin(an2);
per_frame_15=q4 = cos(an2);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=an3 = an3 - tic*treb*treb*.4;
per_frame_19=q5 = sin(an3);
per_frame_20=q6 = cos(an3);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_4=`float4 noiseVal = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, noise_uv);
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 uv3 = (uv_orig-.5)*(.98-.05*rad*rad)+.5;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`ret.xy = tex2D( sampler_fw_main,uv_orig).xy*.9 - .06;
warp_9=`ret.z = tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uv3 + (noiseVal.xy-.5)*.002).z*1 - .00;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`float2 mod = max(aspect.w,aspect.z);
warp_12=`mod = 1/mod;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float2 uvm = (uv_orig - float2(.5,.5))*1.2*aspect.wz;
warp_15=`uvm = (q1*uvm.xy + float2(1,-1)*q2*uvm.yx)*aspect.zw*mod + .5 - float2(.1493,0)*.4;
warp_16=`ret.xy = max(ret.xyz, tex2D( sampler_fw_main,uvm).xy*.9 - .01);
warp_17=`
warp_18=`uvm = (uv_orig - float2(.5,.5))*1.5*aspect.wz;
warp_19=`uvm = (q3*uvm.xy + float2(1,-1)*q4*uvm.yx)*aspect.zw*mod + float2(.325,.5);
warp_20=`ret.xy = max(ret.xy, tex2D( sampler_fw_main,uvm).xy*.9 - .01);
warp_21=`
warp_22=`uvm = (uv_orig - float2(.5,.5))*1.8*aspect.wz;
warp_23=`uvm = (q5*-uvm.xy + float2(1,-1)*-q6*uvm.yx)*aspect.zw*mod + float2(.865,.5);
warp_24=`ret.xy = max(ret.xy, tex2D( sampler_fw_main,uvm).xy*.9 - .01);
warp_25=`
warp_26=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 uvm = uv;
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).x,
comp_6=`
comp_7=`ret = lerp (
comp_8=`GetBlur1(uvm).x + GetBlur3(uvm).x,
comp_9=`ret,
comp_10=`pow(ret,.5));
comp_11=`
comp_12=`ret *= 2.7;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`float2 uv3 = (uv-.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).zzz)+.5;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret += saturate(pow(tex2D(sampler_main, uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).x -ret.x)),
comp_17=`ret += saturate(pow(GetBlur1(uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).x -ret.x)),
comp_18=`  
comp_19=`ret = pow(ret,float3(3,.95,.6))*1.25 -.25;
comp_20=`ret -= tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).yyy;
comp_21=`ret *= ret;
comp_22=` 
comp_23=`ret-= .04;
comp_24=`//ret = pow(ret,float3(.5,1,2));
comp_25=`//ret *= ret;
comp_26=`//ret += tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).yyy*2,
comp_27=`
comp_28=`}
